jump_scares.spoiler: One of the captives gets dragged away suddenly
A man with a disfigured face comes up from behind the woman
A man’s face turns to a skeleton
The man with the crow mask’s face distorts with a loud sound in the background
Some kids throw eggs at the house and they suddenly splatter at the window
A door suddenly slams
An alien creature appears in front of the camera
The alien finds the woman hiding
The clown runs out from the side of the gas station
The clown appears in front of the woman’s car window
The woman turns the driver over to see that it’s a man with a severely disfigured face
The woman raises her head to see the clown right in front of her
The video suddenly zooms in on the clown’s face

movies.title: A Nightmare on Elm Street 5: The Dream Child

jump_scares.spoiler: A man suddenly springs upwards from the bed next to Alice
There is suddenly a loud woosh sound and the camera quickly pans to an empty hallway
Alice suddenly falls through the floor while slowly walking
The camera pans around the diner back to Alice, and she is grabbed on the shoulder by a friend
There is a loud buzzing noise
The diner (a greenscreen) suddenly turns into a close-up of Daniel’s mangled face as he screams, scaring Alice
Daniel’s corpse springs back upwards
The upper half of Greta’s body appears out of the side of a rotting fridge and begins to scream
There is a sudden cut to the tower as Yvonne dives underwater that is accompanied by a loud sound effect
Yvonne reaches her hand out to Amanda, and she suddenly turns around quickly to reveal a decomposing corpse under the robe
An unseen person suddenly suffocates Clare with some plastic wrapping. [Video]
Accompanied by a sound effect, the scene cuts to Clare’s corpse on a rocking chair
Peter startles Jess by throwing some clothing on her while she is on the phone
Billy reaches out with his hand and grabs Jess’s hair
Clara turns the light off and Candyman appears behind her for a brief moment. [Video]
Trevor jumps onto Helen while she is in bed
Helen takes a photo of a door and at the same time, the door opens and a dog barks
Bernie is startled by Helen poking her head through the hole in the wall
Helen closes the medicine cabinet and in the mirror a girl and her dog can be seen
Helen looks into a window and a dog jumps up from the other side
There is an abrupt flashback to a boy screaming
Images of the graffitied head on the wall flash up accompanied by loud noises
Candyman’s hook comes through the medicine cabinet at Helen. [Video]
Helen runs into the living room and sees Bernie’s bloodied body
Candyman’s hand appears above Helen
Candyman’s hook appears in front of the baby
Dr. Burke is stabbed by Candyman
Candyman opens his eyes as Helen is about to attack him
Candyman appears and puts his hand over Helen’s mouth
Helen appears behind Trevor in the mirror. [Video]
The cop is about to open the bag containing Chucky’s remains when his police radio blares into life
Tiffany suddenly attacks the cop as he looks into the bag
A spider lands on Damien while he is looking under the bed
There is a bolt of lightning and Chucky is suddenly sitting on the bed beside Tiffany
An apparently dead Tiffany suddenly jumps up from underneath the water in the bathtub
Warren, who was supposedly dead, suddenly jumps up out of the storage container
David knocks on the car window, startling Jade
Tiffany’s burnt face suddenly appears in the oven window
Tiffany bursts out of the oven and attacks Jade
Chucky hits Tiffany over the head with a spade
Tiffany suddenly springs to life and screams at the investigator
A person lands on the roof of a car behind two Vietnamese workers
Andy rolls over in bed and sees Chucky right in front of him
Shane closes the fridge door and is startled by Chucky who makes a scary face
There is a slight scare during the movie the kids are watching as a man bursts into a room holding a chainsaw
Shane turns around and sees Chucky standing on the bench
During a tense and quiet scene where Andy is walking towards Chucky, Karen suddenly walks past (the loud sound effect is very startling)
Shane is startled by Chucky while urinating
A shadow moves past in the foreground
After seeing Shane’s skinned face, Andy is startled by Chucky who says “surprise”
There is a loud crash as Gabe watches Karen on the security camera
Gabe is suddenly cut on the leg
Chucky suddenly attacks Doreen after saying “Peka-BOO!”
As Andy looks closely at the toy bear, he is suddenly grabbed on the shoulder (a few seconds later there is another slight scare as a balloon pops)
As Andy looks for Chucky, a shadow moves past in the foreground
After Chucky says “when they’re all gone”, Andy is knocked out from behind
After the Buddi song starts playing again, Andy turns around and Chucky suddenly lunges at him
Meg turns around and comes face to face with her dad
A hand enters the tent, startling one of the boys sleeping in it
The clown grabs the boy’s wrist as he approaches
Meg sees a figure move past the screen on the camera footage she is reviewing
Jack touches his mother which causes her to scream
The clown appears in front of Meg
As Jack peeks out of an opening, the clown suddenly appears
A large concrete block moves across the opening
The clown rips through some floor boards causing Jack to scream
The clown suddenly stands up and runs at Meg
The apparently dead clown suddenly grabs Meg around the leg
The chair moves, startling Maggie
The phone rings
Chucky’s head turns around suddenly and he talks to Karen
Chucky comes in to view holding a knife
A bright light turns on, moments later Chucky jumps down onto Andy
Chucky appears at the doorway in front of Andy
Chucky appears behind Andy with a baseball bat
Chucky’s headless body suddenly breaks through a ventilation duct and attacks Jack. [Video]
Annie runs into unseen man
Alice opens the door to find Ralph standing behind it
Hand grabs Jack’s forehead while he lies in bed
Steve is suddenly stabbed by unseen person
The scene abruptly changes to Alice screaming for Bill
Alice discovers Bill’s body pinned to the door with arrows
Brenda’s body bursts through the window in front of Alice
A dead body swings down from tree in front of Alice
A door-handle begins to turn
A man leaps out of the water and grabs Alice in the boat
In a recap of the first movie, a drowned Jason comes out of the water and grabs Alice
A cat jumps in through the window
One of the campers scares the others by disguising himself into a masked killer
A hand holding a hammer suddenly appears and hits the police officer
Mark gets hit by a machete and falls down the stairs
Jason comes up from under the sheets
Jason stands up facing Ginny
Jason’s hand breaks through the window
A pitchfork breaks through the door
Jason starts reaching into the car
Jason leaps toward her as she’s running away
Jason jumps in through the window and grabs Ginny
A sudden alarm ring startles Berman
As Tommy walks into a room, Alice jumps out at him as a joke
Cindy is grabbed on the shoulder while looking into the caves with a flashlight
As Cindy walks through the darkness, Alice says “Boo!” and startles her with a sound cue
Jeremy looks up and sees Tommy standing right in front of him
Alice looks up and with a sound cue, sees Sarah Fier standing in front of her
Alice shines the flashlight on an eyeless corpse standing up
Ziggy is suddenly grabbed on the shoulder by some Sunnyvalers
A silhouette walks by in the foreground with a sound cue
Becky walks into a room and sees Tommy standing on the side of the door
The campers light a match and it reveals Tommy standing in front of them
Gary grabs Ziggy on the shoulder
There is a sudden bang on the door
Ziggy is grabbed on the head by Tommy and dragged up
An alarm suddenly rings, starling Deena and Josh
A blow up doll suddenly appears behind Heather as part of a joke to startle her
A silhouette runs past the screen in the background
Heather turns around and the killer is standing right in front of her

One of Deena’s friends jumps out from behind a toilet stall to scare her as a joke
The curtain falls down to reveal the killer standing behind it
A police car drives out from behind the corner, startling Simon
A silhouette runs across the screen
Josh shines the flashlight on a killer running straight at him
A silhouette once again runs by in the background
Kate is suddenly grabbed from above while hiding
Deena runs into Josh while walking out of the kitchen
Wendy’s lamp light sparks and goes out
The engine fan stuck in Frankie’s head suddenly spins causing his head to jerk forward
The weights come down on Lewis’s head, causing it to explode
Wendy and Kevin bang on the gate to get Erin’s attention
A girl is suddenly impaled by a flagpole

movies.title: Friday the 13th Part VII: The New Blood

jump_scares.spoiler: Dan chopping wood with a machete makes a brief surprising sound effect
Jason bursts through the wall of a tool shed
A body hanging from a tree appears in front of Tina
Jason grabs Tina in a classic moment where the good guys think that it’s all over
After Laurie says goodbye to Allyson there is a loud gunshot as the scene abruptly cuts to Laurie shooting some targets
After a boy is left alone in the car by his father, the boy is startled by a bang on the passenger window
A gun discharges after the boy prods the cop lying on the ground
As the boy begins to drive away, Michael appears in the back seat
Ray opens the door startling Karen. Immediately after this Laurie yells “gotcha” on the stairs startling both Ray and Karen
Vicky is startled by her boyfriend (who scares her as a joke) after going outside to empty the trash
Vicky jumps out of Julian’s bedroom screaming (as a joke) after pretending to be abducted
Vicky tries to close the closet door but it won’t close. Suddenly Michael walks out and attacks Vicky
Sheriff Hawkings startles Laurie from behind
The motion sensor light turns back on and Oscar is suddenly attacked by Michael
Ray opens the door to the police car and sees two bloodied and dead police officers
Laurie waits by the door for Michael when his hand suddenly bursts through a glass panel and grabs her
After seeing a trail of blood, Laurie opens a closet door and finds Ray’s dead body
Mike appears from behind one of the mannequins
The police officer lying on the ground suddenly gasps
In the distance someone shouts ‘Hawkins’, accompanied by a sound cue
Police officers searching the house get startled by each other
Michael suddenly runs in from the right and attacks the police officer
A hand suddenly smashes the lightbulb in the bathroom
A hand smashes through a window and grabs the old man by the head
Michael stabs a lady in the neck with a fluorescent lightbulb
A person in the back seat starts moving and Vanessa screams
The house front door slams shut
The girl on the floor comes alive and screams
A bloody mask lands on the car windshield
A bullet hits the car window,
A hand reaches down from on top of the car and grabs Marion
Marcus tries to leave the car but is pushed back in by Michael
Michael stabs Marcus in the eye
While being shot at by Vanessa, Michael pushes open the car door which hits Vanessa’s gun, causing her to shoot herself
After a quiet and intense scene, a hospital door is opened loudly
Michael appears behind Big John and stabs him in the armpit
A gunshot is heard from inside the house
Michael storms out of the closet
Michael comes back to life and stabs the police officer
Michael suddenly appears behind Karen
The scene abruptly cuts to Laurie screaming while being wheeled through a hospital
There is a loud bang from the inside of the van
Myers suddenly appears and attacks Buddy from behind
Myers breaks through a window
During a nightmare, hands come up through a table and grab Laurie
Several disturbing quick-cuts during one of Laurie’s nightmares may startle some people
A man dressed as a werewolf is suddenly stabbed in the back by Myers
Myers breaks through the back window of the van and attacks Harley
During a hallucination, Myers suddenly grabs Laurie
Myers appears from behind a tree and attacks a police officer
Deborah and young Myers can be seen in the doorway, several seconds later Myers face can be seen in the mirror as Annie closes the medicine cabinet
There are several short flash-backs to Annie being attacked by Myers
Myers grabs Mya around the head while she in on the phone
Myers begins to pound on the bathroom door
As Laurie gets into a car, Myers appears and grabs the driver
Myers and Loomis burst out of the shed
A pumpkin is thrown at the door
A loud noise is heard in the conversation
After the man in the red cape stands in front of the gate, the door behind Harper suddenly opens with a loud bang
The advertising sign on the left in the picture suddenly goes on after a long camera movement
After Evan laughs and turns around, a fake skeleton shoots into the picture with a loud scream from the right corner and frightens him
A big spider crawls through the opening. Suddenly there is a bang and hundreds of small spiders fall into the room
Nathan puts his hand in the hole to help Bailey find her ring. His hand suddenly gets pulled further in
When Harper looks at the door with the Emergency Exit sign, something from the other side hits this
Smoke comes out of the shaft under Nathan and frightens him
As Angela reaches through the fence for the crowbar, someone suddenly steps on her hand. It is teased relatively long, but the impact is still quite effective
The fake skeleton scares Evan again
Since the last 20 minutes scenes have been set up very often without any real jump scare. Here someone bangs on the door as Harper hides under the bed and tries to solve the house puzzle
A shotgun suddenly shoots through the door where The End is
The shotgun shoots again in a quiet scene
The unmasked man is suddenly shot as he squats by the box
Clown face appears behind Harper’s mother as she hugs her
Lauren grabs Michael from behind
Someone whispers “Lauren” and then Eric is seen going into the ceiling
Several more possessed people are seen outside the window
She is surrounded by possessed people
Baby jumps at Bill from behind
The group in the car turn on the car’s headlights revealing a man in front of the car
In one of the unusual dream-like parts of the film, a character jumps out at the camera
Denise begins walking out the room when Otis jumps at her from behind
An old man approaches Denise so she rotates to see another man behind at her
When the doors suddenly close, Denise begins to look around the room when one of the monsters comes at her from behind

movies.title: Jason Goes to Hell: The Final Friday

jump_scares.spoiler: The woman at the cabin is startled when Jason appears right behind her
Diana is spooked when a police officer surprises when she goes outside to get ice
One of the cop characters is attacked by the possessed reporter
Freddy Krueger’s gloved hand bursts out of the ground and snatches Jason’s mask
Footage of a woman running from the killers (starts with a classic jump scare sound)
A bit more footage of the killers’ victim (also starting loudly, to startle the audience)
The same victim crying for help as she’s surrounded by her attackers
Justine is startled by a fellow student near the lockers area
A car engine revs, accompanied by a jump scare sound, as Justine exits a store
As Justine is driving and has her eyes on the road again: a jump scare sound when she notices a car motionless in the middle of the road
Another jump scare sound as Justine is walking down a hallway and the lights go out for a moment
A mystery person walks past one of the dorm rooms in the dark (accompanied by a jump scare sound effect)
The woman with the hoodie (that Justine met at the store) suddenly appears in front of Justine
One of the killers shows up onscreen
The campus security guard is attacked by one of the killers
Violet (hoodie woman) jumps in front of Justine
Another member of the group of killers appears in the hallway as Justine is running away
One of the killers “jumps in” a static shot, attempting to surprise Justine (this is one of the loudest jump scare sounds of the movie)
Justine’s friend Scott appears from an adjacent room and wielding a shotgun (yet another classic jump scare sound effect)
Scott is grabbed by one of the killers as soon as he opens the front door of his own place
(Yet) another jump scare sound effect as it’s shown that one of the killers is watching Justine from a distance
Justine reaches the edge of a rooftop and when she turns around: all the killers have caught up to her
One of the killers rushes past Aaron’s car
There is a loud gunshot during a quiet scene
Skip opens the car door, breaking Amy out of her daze
As Morgan walks towards Amy, Lee suddenly appears in view behind Morgan
A teenage boy jumps out with a gas mask on and  growling to scare Sarah
The same teenage boy is suddenly stabbed all the way from the back of his head and out through his eye socket, pushing his eyeball out
Sarah is suddenly grabbed from behind
Harry Ward is shot from behind just as he was about to attack Tom
‘Frank The Trucker’ opens his cab door, only to see Harry Ward in the cab, immediately followed by Harry Stabbing Frank through the top of his skull
A sudden sound cue and visual of pool balls being hit
Tom turns around and is suddenly attacked by Harry Ward
Tom turns around in the cage only to be face to face with the killer
Harry Ward suddenly appears and attacks Ben Foley
The lights in the grocery store abruptly and loudly turn off
The pick-axe goes through the door missing Sarah’s face by a hair
Harry Ward suddenly appears at the window
Ex-Sheriff Burke suddenly bangs on the car window
The deputy opens the bloodied dryer door and a steaming, grotesque head falls out
Ex-Sheriff Burke turns around and is immediately stabbed by Harry Ward
Harry’s shadow appears on the wall
A miner’s uniform suddenly falls
Harry ward suddenly appears
Tom swings a pick-axe at his rescuer, stabbing him through the head
Ghostface suddenly opens the curtains in front of Drew
Ghostface taps Drew on the shoulder
Bobby startles Cindy as she looks out the window
A noise startles Cindy as she waits in her room for the police
Cindy opens the door and sees the Ghostface mask
Ghostface pops up behind Ray
Ghostface bursts through the wooden cabinet and attacks Cindy again
A screaming Cindy is suddenly run over by a car

movies.title: Scream 6
directors: Matt Bettinelli and Olpin Tyler Gillett

Ethan touches Mindy’s shoulder with a clear lack of manner

A piece of equipment falls from the upper mechanical deck
A wooden ladder slam onto the floor in front of Amy
Even with the power cut, The Fat Lady starts moving and cackling and surprises Amy
The sound of steam releasing from a pump startles Liz

In an homage to both John Carpenter’s classic Halloween (1978) and Hitchcock’s Psycho (1960) young Joey sneaks into the bathroom dressed as a maniacal clown, rips back the shower curtain, raises a knife, and surprises his horrified sister
The son of the carny tears his Frankenstein mask off revealing his disfigured face
Joey is startled by a menacing dog
A magician scares the audience when an volunteer from the audience steps into The Impaler and gets a stake hammered into the her heart
A creepy man offers Joey a ride then unexpectedly points a shotgun at him
The hairdresser’s chair that Samantha is sitting on suddenly drops down
A large stone shoots off the lawnmower and goes through Samantha’s eye
George puts his hand on Nick’s shoulder
An ambulance suddenly slams into George
The scene jump cuts from Vicki practicing her gun shooting skills to a champagne bottle popping and the sorority girls screaming in excitement
Mrs. Slater’s scares Vicki and her boyfriend making out and uses her cane to slashes the waterbed
Stevie kicks a chain in the dark boiler room beneath the pool and startles herself
As Stevie steadies the swinging lightbulb a hand grab her neck and forces her against the wall
Diane frightens Jeanie in the garden looking for Mrs. Slater
The attic door in the ceiling opens and Morgan screams as the camera rushes towards her
As the Jack-in-the-Box stops spinning the killer runs Mrs. Slater’s cane through her back
Katey is started when she turns around in the attic after discovering a clown costume resembling the Jack-in-the-Box
Diane jumps when an object falls from the van’s dashboard
A hand and Mrs. Slater’s cane come in through the van’s sunroof and attack Diane
Discovering Liz dead in the van, Vicki turns around terrified to see a figure wielding Mrs. Slater’s cane
The murder in the clown mask opens his eyes, and the movie ends
